```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Data import

```{r}
data = 
    read_csv(
        "data/weather_data.csv",
        col_types = cols(date = col_date(format = ""),
                         airTemperature = col_double(),
                         atmPressure = col_double(),
                         netRadiation = col_double(),
                         rainfall = col_double(),
                         relativeHumidity = col_double(),
                         soilTemperature = col_double())
    )
```

## Summary stats

```{r}
data %>% summary()
```
